Public Interface IRelationalConnectionDiagnosticsLogger Implements IDiagnosticsLogger(Of DbLoggerCategory.Database.Connection)
type IRelationalConnectionDiagnosticsLogger = interface interface IDiagnosticsLogger<DbLoggerCategory.Database.Connection> interface IDiagnosticsLogger

Docs.summary: An with some extra functionality suited for high-performance logging.

remarks.para: The service lifetime is . This means that each instance will use its own instance of this service. The implementation may depend on other services registered with any lifetime. The implementation does not need to be thread-safe.
See Implementation of database providers and extensions for more information and examples.
